title: Negotiate a Supplier Contract
description: A procurement manager is negotiating a long-term agreement with a supplier for landing gear assemblies.

tasks.description: Analyze the supplier's proposal, including pricing, delivery schedule, and quality terms.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies all key terms in the proposal.

tasks.description: Develop a negotiation strategy, identifying target prices and key concessions to ask for.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a clear negotiation plan.

tasks.description: Negotiate the final terms with the supplier and draft a formal contract for legal review.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reaches a favorable agreement and drafts the contract.
